structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases
Retail Instalment Sales Of Motor Vehicles

law.catch_line: Violation Of Secs. 9 To 14 Or Secs. 18 To 20; Effect
law.text: A violation of sections nine to fourteen, inclusive, or eighteen to twenty, inclusive, by any person shall bar his recovery of any finance charge, delinquency or collection charge or refinancing charge on the retail instalment contract involved.
